steps.title: Prepare Thighs
steps.description: Cut up thighs into chunks and dump them into combined soy sauce, sake, mirin, and garlic. Let marinate for 4-6 hours.

steps.title: Dredge
steps.description: Take each chunk and dredge it in the potato starch.

steps.title: Fry
steps.description: Fry each chunk in ~350 degree oil, should be about 4-5 minutes a piece. Drain on a paper towel, season with salt and pepper, serve with spicy mayo (mayo + sriracha).

steps.title: Get Fresh Fish
steps.description: Get really fresh fish so you don't die.

steps.title: Season Fish
steps.description: Squeeze limes over fish, let sit for 30 minutes.

steps.title: On top
steps.description: Thinly slice red onions, thai chilis, and cilantro and add on top. Eat.

steps.title: Make or buy fresh ravioli to stuff.
steps.description: To make it look up fresh pasta recipes but you'll just need eggs and flour.

steps.title: Roast Garlic
steps.description: Cut off top 1/3 of garlic head, add sea salt and olive oil and cover completely with foil. Put into oven at 450 degrees for an hour.

steps.title: Cook Sweet Potato
steps.description: Cover in tin foil, add to oven for ~30 minutes or until tender.

steps.title: Make Filling
steps.description: Take out roasted garlic (should be a paste) and add cooked sweet potato, zest of 1 lemon and juice of 1/2 lemon, fresh basil, parmesean.

steps.title: Cook and Serve
steps.description: Stuff the ravioli, cook for < 3 minutes, and serve with scallions and butter.

steps.title: + Chicken
steps.description: The chicken I made here was pounded out so it was really thin, then seasoned with a bunch of spices and fried up really quickly.

steps.title: Boil Pasta
steps.description: Boil in salted water, less than box instructions.

steps.title: Cook Sausage
steps.description: Cook on medium low heat, cook until almost cooked through.

steps.title: Warm Sauce
steps.description: Add sauce to pan with vegetable oil, add sausage and warm through.

steps.title: Combine
steps.description: Add pasta into sauce, increase heat and add butter.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Once all butter is melter, take off the heat and add cheese. Season, serve. Adding sauteed mushrooms on top is also yum.

steps.title: Create Marinade
steps.description: Beat eggs and mix with milk, then season with salt, pepper, garlic, paprika, chili powder, and hot sauce.

steps.title: Marinate Chicken
steps.description: Chop chicken into bite size pieces, and marinate them in the seasoned buttermilk / eggs mixture. Marinate for as long as is safe, but for less than 30 min is also fine.

steps.title: Dredge
steps.description: Add about 1/4 cup of the milk mixture to the flour, so there are some clumps of flour. Season the flour well with whatever you like. Add the chicken, one by one, and cover with the flour mixture.

steps.title: Fry
steps.description: In a large pot, add the oil and heat to 375. You want to make sure to not go above this, or you'll burn stuff and it'll taste bad. Add in your nuggets a couple at a time, and make sure not to overcrowd. If they're small, they'll cook for about 3-4 minutes.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Once they leave the oil, season immediately with salt and pepper (or whatever you want). Just make sure it's right after you take them out. Then serve with sauces! An easy and good dipping sauce is mayo and sriracha.

steps.title: Prepare Dashi
steps.description: Soak the kombu in 4 cups of water for 4 hours.

steps.title: Boil Stock
steps.description: Gently bring the kombu in the water it has been soaking in to a boil. Once it hits a boil, turn down to a simmer and simmer for 10 minutes. After this, take out the kombu leaves so it is just stock. Add in the bonito flakes, and bring to a boil. Once it hits a boil, simmer lightly for 5 minutes and turn off the heat, letting the bonito flakes sit in the stock for another 10-15 minutes off the heat. Strain and the stock is done.

steps.title: Prepare Mushrooms
steps.description: Add 2 tbsp. of sesame oil to soy sauce and mirin, along with a full cup of water. Bring this to a light boil, then add dehydrated mushrooms. Let mushrooms sit in simmering mixture until tender.

steps.title: Cook Chicken
steps.description: Sautee chicken breast until cooked through.

steps.title: Prepare Bowls
steps.description: Add 1 tbsp. of sesame oil and 2 tbps. of soy sauce in each bowl, along with 1-2 cups of dashi stock.

steps.title: Cook Noodles
steps.description: Add the udon into boiling unsalted water and cook for no longer than one minute, or until noodles are chewy but not hard, but not too soft either.

steps.title: Cook Egg
steps.description: Cook egg for 6 minutes 40 seconds on high boil. Shock in ice water to stop cooking once done.

steps.title: Assemble
steps.description: Add your cooked noodles to the bowl, toss around to mix the oil and soy sauce with the noodles, then top with mushrooms, sliced chicken, soft-boiled egg and chopped scallions.

steps.title: Start Sauce
steps.description: Chop red onions, then add to a medium pot with olive oil and 2 tbsp. butter. Cook until translucent.

steps.title: Add Garlic, Shallots, Chilis
steps.description: Chop garlic, shallots, and thai chilis, and add to pot with onions. Cook until fragrant. Add red pepper flakes and cook mixture down for 4-5 minutes on medium heat.

steps.title: Add Tomato Paste
steps.description: Add 2 good tbsp. of tomato paste to the mixture, then turn up the heat a bit and cook that mixture through. It should look kind of like a dark red roux at the bottom of your pot.

steps.title: Add Tomatoes and Herbs
steps.description: Add a can of whole tomatoes, and crush them well with your hand. Then fill up the can about 3/4 of the way with water (or vegetable / chicken stock) and add to pot. Then add a bunch of basil, two bay leaves, and, optionally, fresh oregano and thyme sprigs.

steps.title: Cook for... Forever
steps.description: Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook until you're ready to eat it.

steps.title: Toast Bread
steps.description: Butter both sides of your bread, and toast them on a medium-high pan until golden brown.

steps.title: Make Steak
steps.description: Reuse leftover steak, slice it thin while cold, reheat.

steps.title: Assemble
steps.description: Spread horseradish on one side of the bread, then add steak to bottom bread. Grate cheese on top of steak, which should slightly melt it since it's still hot. Then add spinach, andn dress the spinach with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Then add thinly sliced red onions.

steps.title: Boil Pasta
steps.description: Prepare a pot of very salty boiling water. Add pasta and cook until 3-4 minutes before package time.

steps.title: Prepare Shrimp
steps.description: Clean. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, olive oil, half of garlic, parsley. Marinate for 30 minutes.

steps.title: Fry Shrimp
steps.description: In a medium-high skillet, fry the shrimp in a little bit of olive oil, leaving them on one side until almost entirely cooked, then flipp to cook on the other side for very little time. Once flipped, add lemon juice and toss the shrimp in the oil and lemon juice. Take shrimp out of pan and set aside.

steps.title: Add Minced Garlic and Shallots
steps.description: After frying and removing the shrimp, add more olive oil and toss in your minced garlic and shallots.

steps.title: Deglaze
steps.description: Cook until right before the garlic and shallots get lightly brown, then deglaze the pan by adding white wine. Once the alcohol has cooked off, add butter and mix to incorporate.

steps.title: Add Pasta
steps.description: Right as the butter has melted, add in your cooked spaghetti with about 1/4 cup of the water you cooked the spaghetti in. Cook this on high heat and toss.

steps.title: Assemble
steps.description: Dress the pasta with pieces of shrimp (chopped or whole) and season with salt, black pepper, and lemon juice. Top with parsley and red pepper flakes.

steps.title: Prepare Chicken Breast
steps.description: Cut chicken into large, thin cutlets and pound it out to desired thinness. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and lemon.

steps.title: Bread Chicken
steps.description: Dredge chicken in flour, then egg, then panko.

steps.title: Fry Chicken
steps.description: Fill pan with about 1/4 inch of vegetable oil, then fry chicken on medium on one side until browned only on one side.

steps.title: Finish in Oven
steps.description: Flip the chicken, then lightly cover the chicken with sauce, then cover with shredded mozarella cheese. Place pan in the oven at 450 for about 10 minutes until cheese bubbles and burns a bit. Top with shredded parmesean and chopped basil, and a good squeeze of lemon.

steps.title: Make Anchovy Paste
steps.description: Take anchovies out of the oil and lightly pat them dry. Then, in a mortar and pestle or on a cutting board, pulverize / grind and add a bit of salt. Once this is a paste, add in the garlic and incorporate it into a paste.

steps.title: Make Mayo
steps.description: Take the two egg yolks, and add them to a large bowl with the anchovy paste. Whisk to encorporate, then rigorously whisk and slowly drizzle in the olive oil. Once the olive oil is slowly streamed in, add in the vegetable oil at the same rate, maintaining the consistency.

steps.title: Season Mayo into Dressing
steps.description: Squeeze and zest half the lemon, add salt, black pepper, and parmesean. Taste it, season.

steps.title: Assemble Salad
steps.description: Prepare and wash kale, get rid of the bitter stalks. Chop it up lightly, then in a large bowl add your kale and enough dressing to lightly dress. Toss to combine, season the entire salad with more salt, pepper, and cheese. Serve each bowl of salad with a bit of chopped scallion and pickled ginger.

steps.title: Boil Pasta
steps.description: Cook the pasta in salt water to 3-4 minutes under the instructions on the box.

steps.title: Cook Bacon
steps.description: Cut up bacon into bite-size pieces, and cook them (relatively slowly) on medium heat.

steps.title: Chop Vegetables
steps.description: Finely and evenly chop the celery, onion, and carrot. Put aside. Then, chop up shallots and garlic and set aside.

steps.title: Cook Veggies
steps.description: Once bacon is done cooking, add in your chopped onions, celery, and carrots. There should be enough fat to help cook the veggies, but if not, add olive oil. Cook until translucent, then add garlic and shallots. Cook until garlic is just finished cooking, but not brown.

steps.title: Deglaze
steps.description: Add in the chicken stock to deglaze the pan, and continually stir to get any bits that stuck to the bottom encorporated into the sauce.

steps.title: Add in Pasta
steps.description: Once your veggie / bacon base is ready and the chicken stock is mostly cooked out, then add in your cooked pasta along with a bit of the cooking water. Cook this over high heat and continually mix.

steps.title: Finish Sauce
steps.description: Take your eggs and mix them with the cheese in a separate bowl, add pepper. Take the pan off the high heat and toss the pasta for a bit to make sure it's not too hot. Then, gently add in your sauce and stir rigorously until the egg adheres to the noodle and the cheese melts. Don't scramble the eggs.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Serve finished pasta in bowl, and top with chopped celery leaves, shredded pecorino, and a bit of red onion.
